subject: how can i test JSP with JUnit?
msgSnippet: it is quite straight to test java classes with JUnit by writing input data to methods and asserting output. but how can i generate input data to JSP and then
messageBody:
it is quite straight to test java classes with JUnit by writing
input data to methods and asserting output. but how can i generate
input data to JSP and then check validation of output from web
server?
